title: League is meant to be unbalanced
body:
every class of champion will go through their phase of being op, it just rotates, Tank meta, adc meta, assassin meta, supports. its to keep people playing, to feel like the game is "evolving," and to keep people coming back to it, riot 100% make certain champs OP so you can buy their skins,

after all riot is a business and they need to make money off the game

think about if the game was 100% Balance people would get bored, and go play some other game, they would not spend money on it.

replies.body: Truthfully, we're beyond "unbalanced". We've progressed to "poor design". Balance Team needs to step back and reevaluate what brought League of Legends as far as it is.

Occam's Razor: It is just hard to balance a game like this, riot is not doing it on purpose.

This game is hard to balance, and the meta always shifts with every change and with seasonal strategies, making new imbalanced.
